### CreateGT() {#a19ea93f686819dec71fd4bd02ceaee58}

<MemberDefinition

### getAccommodatingFloatType() {#aaa75a5fbe790d656277566bbc8e0bc2e}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class IRBuilderTy&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>Type &#42; llvm::FixedPointBuilder&lt; IRBuilderTy &gt;::getAccommodatingFloatType (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp; Sema)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Given a floating point type and a fixed-point semantic, return a floating point type which can accommodate the fixed-point semantic.

This is either <code>Ty</code>, or a floating point type with a larger exponent than Ty.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/fixedpointbuilder-h/#l00128">128</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/fixedpointbuilder-h">FixedPointBuilder.h</a>.
